Developers

Browse our collection of tools you can embed on your own websites.

Widgets

These prebuilt visualization, which are linked to APIs, will make it easier for developers of all skill to add rich income insights to their page. Below are two widgets for embedding barcharts and maps that pull from our custom APIs. More to come...

Bar Chart

This tool allows users to explore income distributions across different geographies by categories (Race, Gender, and Age Groups). Want to learn more about the income distribution in your home state or other states? This tool is for you. Coming soon will be city data and exploration across time.

Map

This tool allows users to explore income distributions across the US at different percentiles by categories (Race, Gender, and Age Groups). Want to know what the 1% is in different states? Want to know what the median individual income is in different states? This tool is for you. Coming soon will be city level maps as well and exploration across time.

API

This API returns incomes of different percentiles for the overall population for various geographies. In addition, you can make calls for different subsets of the population based on race, gender, and agegroups. Please review documentation on our github.
